narrative.narrative: Chicago Air was a short lived airline that operated from May to November 1986. It was based at Chicago Midway and flew to the Wisonsin cities of Madison,Green Bay,La Crosee,Eau Claire,and Wausau and Traverse City in Michigan and in Illinois the cities of Peoria,Springfield and Moline. It used six Fokker 27's. All the routes it served are served at O' Hare but not Midway as of 2015 anymore. It served as a feeder for Midway Airlines. It had plans to get ten Saab 340's and expand to Des Moines,IA Cedar Rapids,IA Waterloo,IA South Bend,IN Fort Wayne,IN Lafayette,IN Evansville,IN Kalamazoo,MI and Grand Rapids,MI. Missouri,Ohio and Minnesota places would have followed.
